item.title: Welcome Li Yuhan and Liu Ruonan join the lab!
item.description: Welcome Li Yuhan and Liu Ruonan join the lab!

item.title: We introduce DG1000 made by BMK (http://www.biomarker.com.cn/) to our lab!
item.description: We introduce DG1000 made by BMK to our lab! This little machine is capable of generating tens of thousands of single cell partitions in tens of seconds. Its special features and performance are described at BMK webpage. Its innovator and the director of experimental department come to train us in utilizing this system to capture gene expression of single cells sorted from flesh tissue.
